aboutMe.now: I am currently studying a master's degree in User-Centered Interactive Systems, with the intention of improving my skills to be able to create interfaces with greater usability and interactivity.
aboutMe.firstText: I have a bachelors degree in Computer Technologies by the Universidad Veracruzana.
aboutMe.interest: I'm interested in web development and always willing to accept new challenges that require to test my skills in order to continue learning new things.

experience.introduction: I have been working in the government sector, performing the following activities:

sesver.title: Health Services of the Government of the State of Veracruz - IT Department

activities.title: Activities
activities.activitie1: Analysis and prototyping of a system for the Human Resources department of the Health Services of the State of Veracruz.
activities.activitie2: Analysis and prototyping of a system for the warehouses of the Health Services of the State of Veracruz.
activities.activitie3: Analysis and development of a system for the public hospitals of the State of Veracruz to show their medical supplies that are about to expire.
activities.activitie4: Development of a system for the control of fixed assets in the warehouses belonging to the Health Services of Veracruz.

sefiplan.title: Technological Innovation  - Secretary of Finance and Planning of the Government of the State of Veracruz

activities.title: Activities
activities.activitie1: Frontend and creation of reports in a system for delivery reception.
activities.activitie2: Analysis and prototyping of a system for the warehouses of the Health Services of the State of Veracruz.
activities.activitie3: Analysis and prototyping of a system for hospital administration.
